meanings.definition: Relating to the study of ancient life forms.
meanings.sent1: The paleobiologic research team discovered a fossilized dinosaur bone.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use paleobiologic methods to learn about creatures that lived long ago.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiologic expedition found a mysterious ancient plant that glowed in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her interest in paleobiologic mysteries was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a paleobiologic exhibit showcasing ancient marine creatures.

meanings.definition: Involving the biological aspects of prehistoric organisms.
meanings.sent1: The paleobiologic characteristics of the ancient insect were fascinating to the researchers.
meanings.sent2: Studying the paleobiologic features of prehistoric animals helps us understand their evolution.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiologic analysis of the fossilized egg revealed surprising details about the ancient bird.
meanings.sent4: His paleobiologic knowledge was as vast as the prehistoric landscape.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explored the paleobiologic connections between dinosaurs and modern birds.
